RelatedSentence: Solid bars are usually installed into pre-drilled holes and then grouted into place using a separate grout line , whereas hollow bars may be drilled and grouted simultaneously by the use of a sacrificial drill bit and by pumping grout down the hollow bar as drilling progresses .
